item.title: Mike Johnson, Hakeem Jeffries speak on Trump's 'war from within' comments
item.description: A day after Trump said the U.S. is fighting a "war from within," Speaker Mike Johnson and House Minority Leader Hakeem Jeffries react to the president...

item.title: Accusations fly over whether Republicans or Democrats 'own' shutdown
item.description: The closure came amid an impasse between congressional Democrats and Republicans, who are being led by President Donald Trump.

item.title: Offshore earthquake kills at least 69 in Philippines, officials say
item.description: A powerful 6.9-magnitude earthquake killed at least 69 people in the Philippines, officials said on Wednesday.

item.title: WATCH: The US government has shut down for the first time in nearly 7 years
item.description: The federal government is officially shut down. ABC News' Jay O'Brien explains how we got here.

item.title: WATCH: Carnival ride malfunctions at California school event
item.description: Riders were reportedly trapped for up to an hour after a carnival ride malfunction at a school event in Southern California. No injuries were reported...
